tr.td: Non-timber forest products, Climate Change, Ecosystem Services, Mountain Ecosystems
Data were collected using a structured face to face household survey. The questionnaire is provided as a supplementary file
The data were collected from the Upper Madi Watershed of Nepal. 278 households were surveyed.
Data were collected from household surveys using structured questionnaires in Upper Madi Watershed of Nepal. Participants were selected using random sampling.
Institution: Deakin University City/Town/Region: Melbourne Country: Australia
